snippet.title: Quest Hunter - Trailer 2020
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/487000/Quest_Hunter/
PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP5230-CUSA20604_00-2ZQUESTHUNTERPS4
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9ppllcjngfl7
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/quest-hunter-switch/

Quest Hunter is an isometric action-RPG where your choice drives the story. Find tons of treasures and secrets, solve puzzles, equip your character, level up your skills and finish off enemy bosses. Play on the couch, alone or with friends, or make it an online party for up to four players!

True cross-play co-op adventure for all platforms!

Subscribe to our news:
https://discord.gg/2zombie
https://twitter.com/2zombiegames
https://mailchi.mp/557ed7badf09/quest-hunter-news
